text: Álvaro Pombo García de los Ríos (born 23 June 1939) is a Spanish poet, novelist and activist. Pombo was elected to the Real Academia Española on 19 December 2002, he took up his seat on 20 June 2004. In November 2024, Pombo was awarded the Miguel de Cervantes Prize. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Miguel de Cervantes Prize winners Category:Spanish poets Category:Spanish novelists Category:Spanish activists Category:People from Cantabria
title: Álvaro Pombo
